name: In Other Words #4 Quiz | Words for Kids | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
bee, flew.

	'Bee' in this sentence is the flying insect. Flew is the past tense of 'to fly'.

signet, ring.

	A 'signet ring' has the owner's initials engraved on it, and is worn on the finger.

questions.text: The shortest ______ between ______ places is a ______ line.
questions.explanation:
way, two, straight.

	'Way' is the route or direction, and 'two' in the number 2. 'Straight' means direct, or without curves or bends.

days, week.

	'Days' is the plural of day, which is one twenty-four hour period. A 'week' is a period of seven days.

questions.text: I do not like to eat ______, not even ______.
questions.explanation:
meat, steak.

	'Meat' is the flesh of an animal used as food. 'Steak' is a particular cut of meat.

ball, air.

	A 'ball' is the round object used to playing games, and 'in the air' means toward the sky.

questions.text: I helped dad ______ the garden hose onto the ______.
questions.explanation:
wind, reel.

	'Wind' in this sentence is to make a coil. 'Reel' is a cylinder on which the coil is formed.

questions.text: I was ____________ late for school this ______.
questions.explanation:
one, hour, morning.

	'One' is the number 1. 'Hour' is a period of 60 minutes, and 'morning' is the part of the day before noon.

questions.text: Dad went to the kitchen to ______ a cup of ______.
questions.explanation:
pour, tea.

	'Pour' in this sentence means to tip liquid from a container. 'Tea' is the drink made with the leaves of the tea plant.

questions.text: The wind ______ in the ______ of the boat on the ______ water.
questions.explanation:
blew, sail, blue.

	'Blew' is the movement of the air (wind), and 'sail' is the sheet of cloth rigged to harness the power of the wind to move the boat. The other 'blue' is the colour.
